hero.name: Amos P Alex
hero.description: Flutter Developer with 2 years of experience building responsive and scalable cross-platform applications for mobile, web, and desktop. Passionate about clean architecture, performance optimization, and delivering exceptional user experiences.

paragraphsHtml: I'm a Flutter Developer based in Kollam, Kerala, with a strong foundation in building enterprise-grade applications across multiple platforms. My journey began with a B.Tech in Electronics & Communication Engineering from A.P.J Abdul Kalam Technological University, and I've since dedicated myself to mastering cross-platform development.

Currently working at Nexteons LLP, I specialize in developing scalable ERP systems using Flutter, Dart, and GraphQL. I've optimized API performance from 3 seconds to under 500ms, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and built interactive dashboards that serve real business needs.

My approach centers on clean architecture, maintainable code, and user-centric design. Whether it's mobile, web, or desktop, I focus on creating seamless experiences that solve real problems. I'm particularly skilled in state management patterns (GetX, Provider, BLoC), backend integration (GraphQL, REST), and performance optimization.
Beyond coding, I value continuous learning, effective communication, and collaborative problem-solving. I'm always exploring new Flutter capabilities and best practices to deliver better solutions.

valuesGoals.valuesHtml: I believe in writing code that's not just functional, but maintainable, testable, and scalable. Clean architecture isn't just a pattern—it's a mindset. I value collaboration, clear communication, and the discipline to do things right even when deadlines are tight.
valuesGoals.goalsHtml: My goal is to become a senior Flutter architect who shapes technical decisions and mentors teams. I'm focused on deepening my expertise in advanced Flutter patterns, contributing to open-source projects, and building applications that make a meaningful impact at scale.

experience.title: Flutter Developer
highlights: • Developed and maintained a cross-platform ERP system for Web, Windows, and Mobile using Flutter and Dart, ensuring high performance and scalability across all platforms
• Integrated frontend with GraphQL APIs (NestJS backend) and MongoDB; leveraged Apollo Server for testing and query optimization
• Implemented structured navigation with GoRouter, improving UX consistency across app modules and reducing navigation-related bugs by 40%
• Used Hive for local storage and offline support, enhancing app reliability and startup speed by 60%
• Optimized GraphQL API calls by aggregating multiple queries and decoupling pagination, reducing API latency from 3s to under 500ms
• Built interactive dashboards supporting reports, printing, and export to Excel/PDF for internal stakeholders
• Established CI/CD pipelines for automatic web rebuilds and production deployments, streamlining release cycles and reducing deployment time by 70%
• Applied keyboard shortcuts and workflow automation in Flutter web projects to accelerate development and enterprise demos
• Collaborated with backend, QA, and design teams through code reviews, bug triage, and performance tuning

experience.title: Flutter Intern
highlights: • Completed intensive Flutter training covering mobile fundamentals, clean architecture, and cross-platform best practices
• Built reusable UI components and implemented Git-based workflows for version control and team collaboration
• Contributed to code quality improvements through peer reviews, testing, and adherence to coding standards
• Delivered small features and bug fixes while gaining hands-on experience in state management (Provider, GetX) and production-ready project structure
• Collaborated with senior developers on real-world client projects, learning industry best practices and agile methodologies

projects.title: CropMate - Farmers Marketplace
projects.description: A mobile application connecting farmers directly with consumers, eliminating middlemen and enabling fair pricing for agricultural products. Built as a team project with clean architecture and scalable backend integration.
features: Direct farmer-to-consumer marketplace with product listings
Admin module for managing farmers, users, and government schemes
Real-time inventory management and order tracking
Government schemes integration for farmer benefits

projects.title: NEWS TODAY - News Aggregator
projects.description: A modern news application delivering the latest headlines across multiple categories with an intuitive and responsive interface. Integrated with newsapi.org for real-time news updates.
features: Category-based news browsing (Tech, Sports, Business, etc.)
Article sharing and URL launching functionality
Optimized loading and caching for better performance

projects.title: Cook-Share - Recipe Social Platform
projects.description: A social media platform for food enthusiasts to share recipes, follow chefs, and engage with a community of cooking lovers. Features real-time interactions and content moderation.
features: Recipe posting with image uploads and ingredient lists
Real-time feed updates with infinite scroll pagination
Image caching and optimization for fast loading
